channel.title: Comments on: We really appreciate content about the construction

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/we-really-appreciate-content-about-the-construction/#comment-6">admin</a>.
Having a business name does not separate
item.content:encoded:
In reply to admin.

Having a business name does not separate

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/we-really-appreciate-content-about-the-construction/#comment-3">admin</a>.
Having a business name does not separate the business entity from the owner, which means that the owner of the business is responsible and liable for all debts incurred by the business.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to admin.

Having a business name does not separate the business entity from the owner, which means that the owner of the business is responsible and liable for all debts incurred by the business.

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: If the business acquires debts, the creditors can go after the owner\'s personal possessions
item.content:encoded: If the business acquires debts, the creditors can go after the owner\’s personal possessions

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: The creditors can go after the owner\'s personal possessions.
item.content:encoded: The creditors can go after the owner\’s personal possessions.

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Separate the business entity from the owner
item.content:encoded: Separate the business entity from the owner
